text: Pierre Gosnat (August 20, 1948 – January 25, 2015) was a French politician who was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Val-de- Marne department, and was a member of the Gauche démocrate et républicaine. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Paris Category:French Communist Party politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Pierre Gosnat
